name: Lyre’s American Classico RTD Non Alcoholic Wine
description: Cheers-worthy sparkle. Zero regrets. Lyre’s Classico Sparkling wine is your go-to bubbles for toasting, sipping, or pretending you’re at a villa in Tuscany. Bright, dry, and subtly fruity — all in a ready-to-pop can. Crafted for Prosecco-lovers Hints of green apple, lime and peach Light fizz with chalky fine acids 0.0% ABV and low in sugar Elegant, classy, and picnic-perfect Tastes like: crisp, sparkling orchard fruit with a clean finish. Pair with: celebrations, antipasto or a Friday night wind-down, on its own or in a non alcoholic cocktail. Sophisticated sparkling wines sorted. Lyre’s Classico Ready-to-drink sparkling wine cans brings instant fizz without the fuzz. The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks (including non alcoholic wines, white wines and sparkling wines) contain up to 0.5% ABV. The minimal alcohol content in their non alcoholic beverages is similar to a ripe banana.

name: Twisst Alcohol-Free Irish Cream Drink
description: All the indulgence. None of the alcohol. If you love a Baileys moment, meet your new favourite. Twisst Caramel Cream is rich, velvety and alcohol-free, with a delectable fusion of cream, whiskey flavour, and notes of indulgent chocolate, vanilla, and caramel — a dreamy sip for dessert nights, coffee mixes or slow sips on ice. Creamy caramel liqueur flavour Zero alcohol and low gluten Serve over ice, in coffee or dessert non alcoholic cocktails No refrigeration needed Tastes like: smooth caramel, vanilla and whiskey, with a hint of chocolate. Pair with: chocolate desserts, espresso, or a cosy night in. Swirl and sip. Twisst Caramel Cream is heavenly — minus the aftermath. The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks (including irish creams) contain up to 0.5% ABV. The minimal alcohol content in their non alcoholic beverages is similar to a ripe banana.

name: Guinness 0.0 Stout Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: Keep the fridge stocked and lock-in our lowest price with a regular subscription!The Guinness with everything except the alcohol. Guinness 0.0 boasts the same beautifully smooth taste, perfectly balanced flavour, and unique dark colour of Guinness, just without the alcohol.Highly rated and unmistakably Guinness, just without the alcohol, featuring the same dark, ruby red liquid and creamy head, hints of chocolate and coffee, smoothly balanced with bitter, sweet and roasted notes. Aroma - Hints of roasted coffee and chocolate Appearance - Dark Ruby Red with a creamy head Taste - Smoothly balanced with bitter, sweet, roasted notes There are just 17 calories and 3.8g of carbs per 100ml in Guinness 0.0 compared to 35 calories and 2.7g of carbs in full-strength (4.1%) Guinness draught.Please note that at times we may need to send the cans as singles if the 4-pk packaging is damaged.

name: Tanqueray 0% Alcohol-Free Gin with Zero Alcohol
description: Our best selling 0.0% gin for mindful drinkers. 4.8 stars from 96 reviews!Unbelievably Alcohol Free. Unmistakably Tanqueray 0.0%. Tanqueray Zero delivers all the crisp, clean notes of the original, distilled with four classic botanicals — just without the alcohol. Made with juniper, coriander, angelica and liquorice True to the Tanqueray London Dry flavour you know and love Perfect for classic G&Ts and low sugar non alcoholic cocktails Vegan friendly and low calorie Great for mindful sippers or sober socials Tastes like: a proper gin — clean, citrusy, slightly spicy. Pair with: tonic, cucumber or a sprig of rosemary. Get that gin and tonic glow, without the booze. Tanqueray 0.0 is here to class up your 0% game. The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks contain up to 0.5% ABV. The minimal alcohol content in their non alcoholic beverages is similar to a ripe banana.

name: Corona Cero Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: Corona Cero Non Alcoholic Beer - Same crisp refreshment. Zero alcohol. From beach bonfires to BBQs, Corona Cero is your ultimate sunny-day beer — light, easy-drinking, and unmistakably Corona. All vibes, no alcohol. 0.0% ABV Clean, crisp malt profile with a touch of citrus Brewed in Belgium, with the same 100% natural ingredients as classic Corona Just 56 calories per bottle Great for hot afternoons or weekday wind-downs Tastes like: summer - easygoing refreshment with a slice of lime. Pair with: tacos, ceviche, or an ocean breeze. Crack open a cold Corona Cero — sunshine optional, lime essential. The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks contain up to 0.5% ABV. name: Bach All Day Hazy IPA Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: Tropical flavour, chill vibes — zero compromise. This one’s for hazy lovers who want full hop flavour without the alcohol. Bach Brewing All Day Non Alcoholic Hazy IPA brings a punchy combo of Citra, Mosaic and Nectaron hops, minus the hangover. Bursting with tropical citrus hop aroma Proper haze, proper body – no watery nonsense Low calorie beer with just 36 calories per can Low gluten beer with less than 3 PPM of gluten per 330ml can Non alcoholic beer with Less than 0.5% ABV Proudly brewed in NZ Tastes like: summer by the sea, with mango, citrus and pine. Pair with: a hot day, salty snacks, or your favourite playlist. Bach All Day Hazy IPA is your go-to non-alcoholic hazy. Add it to the fridge and crack one any time.The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks contain up to 0.5% ABV. The minimal alcohol content in their non alcoholic beverages is similar to a ripe banana.

name: Garage Project Tiny Hazy Beer Alcohol Free
description: Tiny but mighty! Don’t let the name fool you — Tiny is huge on juicy hop character. This award-winning Hazy IPA from Garage Project delivers all the tropical oomph and haze you’d expect from a full-strength brew, but at just 0.5%. Packed with Mosaic, Strata & Simcoe hops Hazy, golden pour with citrus burst Proper body and bitterness Non alcoholic beer with less than 0.5% ABV Made by one of NZ’s most loved brewers Tastes like: passionfruit, pineapple, citrus peel — with a crisp bitter finish. Pair with: spicy food, summer hangs, or Tuesday afternoons. When you want craft flavour without the alcohol, Tiny is mighty. The Chiller New Zealand non alcoholic drinks contain up to 0.5% ABV. The minimal alcohol content in their non alcoholic beverages is similar to a ripe banana.

name: Ara Zero Rose | Non Alcoholic Wine | Zero Alcohol | Flavours of Strawberry, Lime and Guava
description: Best-selling wine of the summer! This bright, refreshing non-alcoholic Rosé wine has flavours of strawberry, lime and guava with a delicious citrus crispness. All balanced by a subtle sweetness, with a fresh and moreish finish, leaving you wanting more. Make this your go-to-wine for occasions when you want the taste of a flavoursome Rosé, without the alcohol.

name: Adnams Cabernet Tempranillo Alcohol Free Red Wine
description: Made from a blend of sun-ripened Cabernet Sauvignon and Tempranillo, this dealcoholised wine is full of ripe, red berry fruit flavours with a hint of spice. Enjoy alone or with tomato-based dishes. From the warm vineyards of Spain, Adnams' 0.5 dealcoholised wines showcase all the characters of each grape variety but without the alcohol. The perfect choice without compromise!

name: Adnams Ghost Ship Pale Ale
description: The lovely citrus taste and aroma of the full proof Ghost Ship, but with almost all of the alcohol smuggled away. Using a special blend of East Anglian Malt and bold American hops like Citra, this uniquely balanced brew ensures the resulting beer not only tastes amazing, but it as close to the original as we can get.

name: Adnams Wild Wave Non Alcoholic Cider | Zero Alcohol
description: Wild Wave is a high juice, full-bodied, cider with a refreshing balance thanks to its unique blend of bittersweet and dessert apples. Inspired by a walk on Southwold beach, the vision was to create a premium cider made entirely from English apples, with a taste so fresh and fruity, it would feel like a refreshing splash in the face. Taste: Fermenting with champagne and wine yeasts creates a bright, sparkling cider with flavours and aromas of fresh apples, mango, and tropical fruit. Elegantly balanced with a medium-dry-finish, it is to be served at North Sea temperatures.

name: AF VØD%A Spritz - Zero Sugar | Alcohol-Free Ready To Drink Cocktail
description: Zero booze, zero sugar, but this Vodka Spritz is still zesty AF. Inspired by the timeless Vodka Soda, with Passionfruit, a dash of Lime and a hit of Afterglow™ Afterglow™ is a 100% natural botanical extract that mimics the pleasant warmth of alcohol - without the alcohol.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Ginger & Citrus Soda Water, Bottles
description: Roll up! roll up! meet the star of the show – Our Ginger & Citrus Soda. This sparkling spectacle combines the zesty zing of citrus with the warming heat of ginger, performing a balancing act that's sure to captivate your taste buds. Whether it's adding a lively twist to your favourite spirits or taking centre stage on its own, this soda promises a flavour performance that's nothing short of extraordinary.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Grapefruit & Thyme Tonic Water, Bottles
description: Add a Mediterranean twist to your favourite drop with Alchemy & Tonic Grapefruit & Thyme Tonic Water. Infused with natural extracts for true magic in every sip. Great with Gin or on its own. Whatever tickles your fancy.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Indian Tonic Water, Bottles
description: Transform your favourite drop with Alchemy & Tonic Indian Tonic Water. Infused with a pinch of Cinchona bark & Kawakawa extracts for magic in every sip. Great with our 0% Gins or on its own. Whatever tickles your fancy.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Pineapple & Jalapeño Soda Water, Bottles
description: Ignite your senses with our Pineapple & Jalapeno Soda, a daring fusion that will set your taste buds ablaze. This tantalizing blend combines tropical pineapple with a spicy kick of jalapeno, creating a flavour spectacle that's truly mesmerising. Savour solo or pair with your favourite Tequila for a fiery explosion. This soda promises to fan the flames of your next fiesta.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Rhubarb & Smashed Mandarin Tonic Water, Bottles
description: Transform your favourite drop with our all new Alchemy & Tonic - Smashed Rhubarb & Mandarin Tonic Water. Infused with Smashed Rhubarb & Mandarin extracts for magic in every sip. Great with Gin or on its own. Whatever tickles your fancy.

name: Alchemy & Tonic Soda Water, Bottles
description: This Soda Water is infused with cascades of fine bubbles and bicarbonate of soda.Charcoal filtered for purity, each sip brings clarity, letting your top shelf spirits truly shine.

name: The Chiller's Non-Alcoholic Red Wine Bundle featuring Thomson & Scott Noughty, Giesen, Darling Cellars and Adnams
description: Few things compare to the feeling of taking the first sip from a glass of red. Rich, inviting and goes down smoothly. Curling up in a cozy lounge, or savouring a glass with dinner, just got better with this Red Wine Bundle, featuring a range of non-alcoholic wines from around the world. This bundle includes: Tread Softly Everything Except Pinot Noir, Australia 1x 750ml Plus & Minus Alcohol Free Pinot Noir, Australia 1x 750ml Giesen 0% Merlot, New Zealand 1x 750ml Plus & Minus Alcohol Free Shiraz, Australia 1x 740 All of our drinks are non-alcoholic and contain 0.5% ABV or less.

name: Alcohol-Free White Wine Bundle
description: A mixed bundle for the white wine lovers out there. A wonderful mix of styles and flavours from vineyards around the world. The bundle includes: Giesen 0% Chardonnay, NZ 1x 750ml Thomson & Scott Noughty Organic Sparkling Wine, Spain 1x 750ml Ara Zero Sauvignon Blanc, NZ 1x 750ml Giesen 0% Pinot Gris, NZ 1x 750ml Giesen 0% Sauvignon Blanc Spritz, NZ 1x 750ml Thomson & Scott Noughty White Wine (Chardonnay/Chenin), South Africa 1x 750ml All of our drinks are non-alcoholic and contain 0.5% ABV or less.
